mdx:
<TextFormatter
	insertions={[
		{
			text: "{INTRO}",
			replacement: (
				<Tablature
					positions={[
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 2, guitarFret: 3 },
						{ guitarString: 2, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 2, guitarFret: 3 },
						{ guitarString: 2, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 2, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ space: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 3 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ space: 1 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ space: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 5, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ space: 1 },
						{ guitarString: 4, guitarFret: 4 },
						{ guitarString: 5 },
						{ guitarString: 6, guitarFret: 3 },
						{ guitarString: 4 },
					]}
					notes="La canción se toca con el capo en el traste 1. Este punteo se toca al inicio y al final de la canción"
				/>
			),
		},
	]}
>
	{DATA.song.parsedLyrics}
</TextFormatter>
